challenge.title: Water Bucket Challenge
challenge.description: You have two buckets, one with 3 liters and the other with 5 liters. The goal is to obtain exactly 4 liters of water in one of them. The water supply is infinite!

allowedActions.description: You can perform the following actions:
allowedActions.transfer: Transfer water from one bucket to another.

challenge.footerDescription: Try to solve the challenge using the fewest number of moves possible!
